pages.text: Much like other parasites, Vagrant strikes may pierce even the strongest forms of armor, provided they have developed a special appendage called a Slicer. This usually happens at Tier 1, and it protrudes from their central head.

When attacking, the Slicer will strike in unison, dealing a small amount of damage regardless of defensive augmentation. It does appear to be less effective if the Vagrant attacks too quickly, so most opt for strikes at around the speed of a standard Sword.
The Slicer may also drain the stamina of humans it strikes, reducing the chance they can fight back.
